channel.title: My recent sickness
channel.description:
Hello, If you've been on IRC you'd know about my bad fever. I have a fever of 101. I want to know if this is a natural symptom of having a fever. Well; today I woke up at around 6:00AM. Usually I wake up at 10-12AM. So I did what every person would do.. I tried to go back to sleep. Unfortenetly, I wasn't able to. So at 6:00 I tried to get out of bed. . I later found out that my body was extremely week. My legs were twisting around, I was dizzy as fuck (When I got up to brush my teeth. Read on ->). I went to go brush my teeth, and I couldn't stay standing up. I fell to the ground and hit my head of the sink counter. I blacked out for about 10 minutes. When I woke up. I crawled back to bed. And I'm scared of getting up because I'm afraid something else might happen.. Right now I'm on my father's personal Laptop. Both my parents aren't home. What should I do? Does this sound natural to you?
EDIT: I spelt symptom wrong, And I used Chrome to fix it for me.. Now i have this.. [img]http://i183.photobucket.com/albums/x34/luke_livez/symptom.jpg[/img] nothing happens when I click it. It doesn't go away.

item.title: My recent sickness
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Pull the plug.

On your Laptop of course, and then call someone for help.

Oh and you were probably dehydrated. That gets you dizzy as hell. Perhaps drink and eat something.

Read full topic

item.title: My recent sickness
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:2, topic:284558”]I would call a parent first. You probably just have the regular flu, just rest and drink fluids.[/quote]I agree, also stay warm, that also helps a bunch.

Read full topic

item.title: My recent sickness
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

You have symptoms of the swine flu, although it’s offten in regular flu as well, I would consult a doctor and tell your parents about this.

EDIT: My father is a first responce paramedic, these symptoms seem to be a Ear infection and some sort of mild flu, I would still consult a doctor about this though.

Read full topic

item.title: My recent sickness
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:5, topic:284558”][quote author=`Lewk_ link=topic=376020.msg2833515#msg2833515 date=1245507284]
I spelt symptom wrong, And I used Chrome to fix it for me… Now i have this…

nothing happens when I click it. It doesn’t go away.
[/quote]I don’t get this part?[/quote]
I’ll try to explain. I spelt “symptom” wrong. So I tired to use Chromes spell check feature. I right clicked; and clicked on “symptom”. Now it won’t go away. It just sits there…

Read full topic

item.title: My recent sickness
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Call your neighbor, call your parents, those would be the sensible options.

Read full topic

item.title: My recent sickness
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote="`Lewk_, post:1, topic:284558"]I spelt symptom wrong, And I used Chrome to fix it for me… Now i have this…

nothing happens when I click it. It doesn’t go away.[/quote]I don’t get this part?

item.title: My recent sickness
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

xpatx:

I would call a parent for immediate help. Who knows what else might happen when you don’t have supervision around you? You might be cutting something, and then pass out on the knife and there you go. I would really reccomend calling your mother or father and ask for an appointment to the doctors immediately. You need to be taken care of. Drink many fluids so your body can maintain a basic healthiness.[/quote][quote=“Chassy13, post:2, topic:284558”]I would call a parent first. You probably just have the regular flu, just rest and drink fluids.

Thanks for the opinions. I’ve drank about 6 bottles of gatorade. And I’m feeling a bit better.

Read full topic

item.title: My recent sickness
item.dc:creator: @xpatx xpatx
item.description:
@xpatx wrote:

I would call a parent for immediate help. Who knows what else might happen when you don’t have supervision around you? You might be cutting something, and then pass out on the knife and there you go. I would really reccomend calling your mother or father and ask for an appointment to the doctors immediately. You need to be taken care of. Drink many fluids so your body can maintain a basic healthiness.

Read full topic

item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I would call a parent first. You probably just have the regular flu, just rest and drink fluids.
